Package project

Class Project

java.lang.Object
project.Project
public class Project
extends java.lang.Object
Class for all the logical operations that a project needs

      Parameters:

    • deleteProject

      public void deleteProject()
      Deletes a project by its projectID, first finds all the users associated with the project, removes the particular project from the users then calls the JSONHandler to delete the corresponding JSON project file
      Parameters:
      projectID -

    • saveProject

      public void saveProject()
      Writes all the project's data to a JSONObject and calls the JSONHandler to save it to a JSON file

    • addNewMember

      public boolean addNewMember​(java.lang.String userID)
      Adds a new member to the project. First checks if the user is not already added to the project, if not it adds the project to the new user and then adds the user to the project and everything gets saved to the corresponding JSON files
      Parameters:
      userID -

    • removeProjectFromUser

      public void removeProjectFromUser​(java.lang.String userID)
      Removes a project from the given user
      Parameters:
      userID - the user's id to know who to remove from the project

    • addProjectToUser

      public void addProjectToUser​(java.lang.String userID)
      Adds the project to the given user
      Parameters:
      userID - the user's id to add the project to
